verses.verse: It is <S%G191>reported<s%> <S%G3654>commonly<s%> that there is <S%G4202>fornication<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%> <S%G3748>as<s%> <S%G3687>is<s%> not so <S%G3761>much<s%> as <S%G3687>named<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> should <S%G2192>have<s%> his <S%G3962>father's<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> puffed <S%G5448>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3996>have<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G3996>mourned<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he that hath <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2041>deed<s%> might be taken <S%G1808>away<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

To <S%G3860>deliver<s%> such an <S%G5108>one<s%> unto <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G3639>destruction<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> may be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> let us keep the <S%G1858>feast<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%>, <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G2549>malice<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread of <S%G1505>sincerity<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>. the feast: or, holyday

<S%G2532>Yet<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3843>altogether<s%> with the <S%G4205>fornicators<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> with the <S%G4123>covetous<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G727>extortioners<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> with <S%G1496>idolaters<s%>; <S%G1893>for<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> must ye <S%G3784>needs<s%> <S%G1831>go<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to keep <S%G4874>company<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> that is <S%G3687>called<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2228>be<s%> a <S%G4205>fornicator<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4123>covetous<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G1496>idolater<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3060>railer<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3183>drunkard<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G727>extortioner<s%>; with such an <S%G5108>one<s%> no <S%G3366>not<s%> to <S%G4906>eat<s%>.
